official_title: Joint resolution to designate the period February 9, 1975 through February 15, 1975 as National Peanut Butter and Milk Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate the period February 9, 1975, through February 15, 1975, as "National Peanut Butter and Milk Week."
